Description.Text: This apartment hotel is located in Barcelona's Gothic district, in El Born, with its narrow, twisting backstreets. This area of the city is renowned for its wide range of pretty restaurants where excellent Tapas, Mediterranean cuisine and the best fish and seafood in Barcelona are served. Guests will also find many bars here with their own terraces, lending El Born the feeling of a modern, arty, cosmopolitan quarter. Only a few streets away lie art galleries, artists' studio, designer shops and museums such as the Picasso Museum, the Textile Museum and many more. It is only a short walk to Barcelona's cathedral, and from there, only a little walk to the promenade of La Rambla and the sea. The airport is around 20 km from the hotel.

The charming rooms are all fully equipped with an en suite bathroom, hairdryer, plasma TV and Internet access. In addition, they are equipped with a kitchen where guests will find a fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making facilities as well as individually adjustable air conditioning and heating and a double bed. The original stonework in the walls lends the apartments character.

Renovated in 2005, this apartment complex comprises 6 apartments sleeping 1-2 persons each. The lodgings are housed in a modern building with lift access. Furthermore, guests are invited to take advantage of the WLAN access point free
